title: Inquiry on How to Use Adaptive Cruise Control
description: A new owner calls asking for an explanation of how to use the Adaptive Cruise Control feature.

tasks.description: Identify the caller's vehicle model to ensure the instructions are accurate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer owns a model with 'Co-Pilot360 Assist+'.

tasks.description: Access the digital owner's manual or knowledge base for the feature.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up the relevant 'How-To' guide for Adaptive Cruise Control.

tasks.description: Explain the function of the buttons on the steering wheel to activate the system and set the speed and following distance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear, step-by-step verbal instructions.
